stimulusHtml: Which of the following most accurately describes an electromagnetic wave traveling through a vacuum?
choicesHtml: It is a compression wave. The electric and magnetic components are compressions and rarefactions parallel to the wave’s velocity.
It is a compression wave. The electric and magnetic components are fields with compressions and rarefactions perpendicular to the wave’s velocity.
It is a transverse wave. The electric and magnetic components are fields perpendicular to each other and to the wave’s velocity.
It is a transverse wave. The electric and magnetic components are fields parallel to each other and perpendicular to the wave’s velocity.
